title: Best Friend, NBA All Star Game, American Idol, Genea Sky and more.
itunes:title: Best Friend, NBA All Star Game, American Idol, Genea Sky and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The CEO is talking about 45 and Tommy mentions a funny meme about President's Day. What would you do if you caught your best friend's husband doing scandalous things? The NBA All-Star Weekend was an extended tribute to Kobe Bryant. Uncle Steve sings his own rendition of the National Anthem. American Idol is back and Lionel speaks his mind. Steve answers questions about the United States in Ask Steve. The stripper who fell 15 feet maybe looking into another career. Is it necessary to ask to recline your seat on an airplane? Are there really cussing dog collars out there? Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about the importance of never quitting, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
